name: necroverse
description: Necroverse - Where Dead Tech Breathes Again

scripts.build:netlify: pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile && pnpm --filter @necroverse/necrodev build && pnpm --filter @necroverse/necroplay build && node scripts/merge-netlify-builds.js
scripts.build:netlify:all: pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile && pnpm --filter @necroverse/necrodev build && pnpm --filter @necroverse/necroplay build
scripts.build:amiron: pnpm --filter @amiron/exec build && pnpm --filter @amiron/pal build && pnpm --filter @amiron/workbench build && pnpm --filter @amiron/ritual-api build && pnpm --filter amiron build
